svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 7 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 7, 2023" date: "2023-10-06"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Devnet-9: testing
finding issues , MEV-Boost testing started (20% of the network) Devnet-10: launch once no issues on
devnet-9, short lived, to include KZG ceremony Goerli testnet upgrade timing: still too early to set a
date
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
â€¢ Devnet-9: testing finding issues , MEV-Boost testing started (20% of the network)
Devnet-9: testing finding issues , MEV-Boost testing started (20% of the network)
â€¢ Devnet-10: launch once no issues on devnet-9, short lived, to include KZG ceremony
Devnet-10: launch once no issues on devnet-9, short lived, to include KZG ceremony
â€¢ Goerli testnet upgrade timing: still too early to set a date
Goerli testnet upgrade timing: still too early to set a date
â€¢ Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.13% has slightly reduced but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.13% has slightly reduced but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~80% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~80% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~80% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Layer 1
â€¢ Blutgang : RPC load balancer & cache, in Rust
Blutgang : RPC load balancer & cache, in Rust
â€¢ Revm v3.5.0 : transitioned to Alloy types
Revm v3.5.0 : transitioned to Alloy types
â€¢ Geth & Reth allow sync to historical hash
Geth & Reth allow sync to historical hash
â€¢ Besu (execution layer client) Bonsai Tries storage explainer
Besu (execution layer client) Bonsai Tries storage explainer
â€¢ Verkle implementers call notes
Verkle implementers call notes
For Stakers
â€¢ Stakesaurus: guide to home staking , aimed at novices
Client releases
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v2.51.0 : fixes
â€¢ Erigon v2.51.0 : fixes
Layer 2
â€¢ OP Stack fault proof system live on OP Goerli testnet, alpha
OP Stack fault proof system live on OP Goerli testnet, alpha
â€¢ Metis (optimistic rollup) reverting to storing transaction data on mainnet
Metis (optimistic rollup) reverting to storing transaction data on mainnet
â€¢ EIP4844 economics : model rollup costs for posting on blobs and blocks
EIP4844 economics : model rollup costs for posting on blobs and blocks
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs EIP7530 : EVM profiles for zk rollups
EIPs
â€¢ EIP7530 : EVM profiles for zk rollups
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7527 : Token bound function oracle AMM contract ERC7528 : ETH (native
asset) address convention (0xe) ERC7529 : Contract discovery and eTLD+1 association ERC7531 : Staked
ERC721 ownership recognition
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7527 : Token bound function oracle AMM contract
ERC7527 : Token bound function oracle AMM contract
â€¢ ERC7528 : ETH (native asset) address convention (0xe)
ERC7528 : ETH (native asset) address convention (0xe)
â€¢ ERC7529 : Contract discovery and eTLD+1 association
ERC7529 : Contract discovery and eTLD+1 association
â€¢ ERC7531 : Staked ERC721 ownership recognition
ERC7531 : Staked ERC721 ownership recognition
Holding Lido publicly accountable: interview with Ben Edgington
Lido governance is not fit for purpose.Â Donâ€™t miss this episode with Ben Edgington . (Watch on
YouTube )
Ben also talks about his Upgrading Ethereum book and Ethereum governance.
Stuff for developers
â€¢ OpenZeppelin Contracts v5 : Adds AccessManager, GovernorStorage, ERC2771Forwarder, ERC1967Utils,
Nonces, MessageHashUtils and Time Removals include: Address.isContract, Counters, ERC777, SafeMath,
TokenTimelock, escrow contracts and all presets Uses custom errors, explicit imports and Solidity
compiler minimum of v0.8.20
OpenZeppelin Contracts v5 :
â€¢ Adds AccessManager, GovernorStorage, ERC2771Forwarder, ERC1967Utils, Nonces, MessageHashUtils and
Time
Adds AccessManager, GovernorStorage, ERC2771Forwarder, ERC1967Utils, Nonces, MessageHashUtils and Time
â€¢ Removals include: Address.isContract, Counters, ERC777, SafeMath, TokenTimelock, escrow contracts
and all presets
Removals include: Address.isContract, Counters, ERC777, SafeMath, TokenTimelock, escrow contracts and
all presets
â€¢ Uses custom errors, explicit imports and Solidity compiler minimum of v0.8.20
Uses custom errors, explicit imports and Solidity compiler minimum of v0.8.20
â€¢ Hardhat v2.18.0 : adds support for scoped tasks
Hardhat v2.18.0 : adds support for scoped tasks
â€¢ Foundry: Forge-std v1.7.0 / v1.7.1 : adds serializeJson cheat code, unixTime, marks parseJsonKeys as
pure and renames exit_code to exitCode Vulcan v0.4.0 : adds unwrap to obtain result value, set custom
revert message with expect, isOk & isError for improved error handling and interaction with external
HTTP servers Scope (VS Code extension): Remix-like & visual wrapper of some Foundry features, alpha
Foundry:
â€¢ Forge-std v1.7.0 / v1.7.1 : adds serializeJson cheat code, unixTime, marks parseJsonKeys as pure and
renames exit_code to exitCode
Forge-std v1.7.0 / v1.7.1 : adds serializeJson cheat code, unixTime, marks parseJsonKeys as pure and
â€¢ Vulcan v0.4.0 : adds unwrap to obtain result value, set custom revert message with expect, isOk &
isError for improved error handling and interaction with external HTTP servers
Vulcan v0.4.0 : adds unwrap to obtain result value, set custom revert message with expect, isOk &
â€¢ Scope (VS Code extension): Remix-like & visual wrapper of some Foundry features, alpha
Scope (VS Code extension): Remix-like & visual wrapper of some Foundry features, alpha
â€¢ Huff: Huff-test : macros for pure Huff test assertions Py-huff : Huff compiler in Python Zyclone :
mixer in Huff (similar to Tornado Cash), gas optimized ~5x cheaper to deposit
Huff:
â€¢ Huff-test : macros for pure Huff test assertions
Huff-test : macros for pure Huff test assertions
â€¢ Py-huff : Huff compiler in Python
Py-huff : Huff compiler in Python
â€¢ Zyclone : mixer in Huff (similar to Tornado Cash), gas optimized ~5x cheaper to deposit
Zyclone : mixer in Huff (similar to Tornado Cash), gas optimized ~5x cheaper to deposit
â€¢ Vyper v0.3.10 : adds codesize optimization mode, pragma directives, uses MCOPY in generated code and
generates selector tables with O(1) performance
Vyper v0.3.10 : adds codesize optimization mode, pragma directives, uses MCOPY in generated code and
â€¢ CTFs: Secureum RACE #22: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers by Tincho
CTFs:
â€¢ Secureum RACE #22: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers by Tincho
Ecosystem
â€¢ Vitalik on enshrining & de-enshrining features in the protocol : account abstraction, zk-EVMs,
proposer-builder separation, private transaction pools, liquid staking and precompiles
Vitalik on enshrining & de-enshrining features in the protocol : account abstraction, zk-EVMs,
â€¢ Ethereum.org writers cohort 2 starts October 20
Ethereum.org writers cohort 2 starts October 20

Etherscan event log advanced filter
Enterprise
â€¢ UBS pilot tokenized Variable Capital Company (VCC) fund as part of Monetary Authority of Singaporeâ€™s
Project Guardian
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.7 to 93.7 gwei, with 9.9 gwei average Negative issuance
currently at 21.2 gwei 8.6k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.7 to 93.7 gwei, with 9.9 gwei average

Negative issuance currently at 21.2 gwei

8.6k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1,611 - $1,736, currently $1,646
ETHUSD : $1,611 - $1,736, currently $1,646
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.059 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.059 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Winding down: Yield Protocol and Utopia product
Winding down: Yield Protocol and Utopia product

free creation on Zora Network, 0.000111 ETH mint fee)
